name: Monster Sheep (LD33)
description:
A sheep must become the monster to save its friends against traps, UFO spaceships and dangerous cliffs! Be fast and save all sheep to get more points and enter the leaderboard! 

How to play: 
Use your special abilities to herd your friends to the barn and move on to the next level. 

Controls: 
LMB: Control sheep 
Put on/off wolf mask (Hotkey 1) -> scares away other sheep 
Howl (Hotkey 2) -> make your friends run far away from you :( 
Eat grass (Hotkey 3) -> Get extra speed for a little while! 

Game was developed by: 
Guilherme Cunha - Programming (www.ynotgames.com) 
David Gutierrez - Soundtrack (www.davidfga.com) 
Daniel Snd - Art
